item.title: 微软在聊天机器人竞赛中落后于 OpenAI
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，马特-戴（Matt Day）将报道微软在努力开拓消费类人工智能工具市场时所面临的挑战。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Matt Day reports on the challenges facing Microsoft as it tries to make headway in the market for consumer artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: 为什么自来水在美国富裕城市是奢侈品？
item.description:
在休斯顿、菲尼克斯、俄勒冈州波特兰市和其他城市地区，"管道贫困 "正在激增。【原文：

“Plumbing poverty” is surging in Houston, Phoenix, Portland, Oregon and other urban areas.

】

item.title: 长滩港计划如何最终超越竞争对手洛杉矶
item.description: 站在俯瞰南加州圣佩德罗湾的码头上，外人很难分清长滩港的尽头和洛杉矶港的起点。但是，构成西半球最大海运枢纽的货运门户却是截然不同的。【原文：Standing on the docks overlooking San Pedro Bay in Southern California, it’s hard for an outsider to tell where the Port of Long Beach ends and the Port of Los Angeles begins. But the cargo gateways that make up the Western Hemisphere’s largest maritime hub are distinct.】

item.title: 象牙海岸首次发行武士债券融资 3.36 亿美元
item.description: 象牙海岸首次发行了 500 亿日元（约合 3.36 亿美元）的武士债券，以实现资金来源的多样化。【原文：Ivory Coast has raised 50 billion yen ($336 million) in Samurai bonds, the country’s first, as it moves to diversify financing sources.】

item.title: 德意志银行的 Saravelos 认为鲍威尔大戏将笼罩美元
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）外汇研究全球主管乔治-萨拉维洛斯（George Saravelos）表示，对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普解除美联储主席职务的担忧将继续笼罩市场，并给美元和国债带来压力，直到问题得到解决。【原文：Concern about US President Donald Trump removing the Federal Reserve chairman will continue to linger over markets and put pressure on the dollar and Treasuries until it is resolved, said George Saravelos, global head of FX research at Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚债券在动荡后实现 "180 度大逆转
item.description: 罗马尼亚财政部长斯特凡-纳努（Stefan Nanu）周四表示，罗马尼亚已经摆脱了今年早些时候出现的债券市场动荡，借贷成本的下降意味着该国的债务出售计划不再是一个问号。【原文：Romania has emerged from the bond-market turmoil seen earlier this year and falling borrowing costs mean there’s no longer a question mark over the nation’s debt-sale plans, Treasury Chief Stefan Nanu said Thursday.】

item.title: 减产导致中国硅片价格创 2023 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 受减产和政府广泛推动解决行业产能过剩的影响，中国太阳能电池板关键部件的价格创下两年来最大涨幅。【原文：The price of key solar panel components in China surged the most in two years, driven by production cuts and a broader government push to address industry overcapacity.】

item.title: Teneo 收购普华永道澳大利亚重组部门，酝酿出售股权
item.description: 通信和咨询公司 Teneo 已同意收购普华永道会计师事务所在澳大利亚的业务重组服务部门。【原文：Communications and consulting firm Teneo has agreed to buy PricewaterhouseCoopers’ business restructuring services unit in Australia.】

item.title: 鲍威尔的命运岌岌可危，投资者惶惶不安
item.description:
诚信资产公司的吉尔伯特说，特朗普可能是在试探市场反应

。【原文：

Trump may be floating a trial balloon to gauge market reaction, Integrity Asset’s Gilbert says

】

item.title: 二十国集团财政部长直面特朗普关税对经济增长的冲击
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战的阴云笼罩下，各国财长和央行行长齐聚一堂，南非呼吁 20 国集团发达经济体加强合作。【原文：South Africa called for greater cooperation among the Group of 20 advanced economies, as finance ministers and central bank governors gathered under the cloud of US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 越南称谈判代表仍在与美国就贸易协议进行谈判
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普首次宣布关税协议两周多之后，越南谈判代表仍在与美国同行商讨协议条款。【原文：Vietnam’s negotiators are still working on the terms of the tariff deal with their US counterparts, more than two weeks after it was first announced by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 对冲基金在暴涨之后瞄准小盘股
item.description: 由于对美国经济在全球贸易战面前的韧性仍存疑虑，对冲基金在经历灼热的反弹后，正加大对小型公司股票的押注。【原文：Hedge funds are ramping up bets against the shares of smaller companies after a searing rally, as doubts linger about the resilience of the US economy in the face of a global trade war.】

item.title: 2,500 亿美元大涨后，Netflix 面临盈利下滑风险
item.description: 随着 Netflix 公司股价接近其 2022 年以来的最高估值，这家流媒体巨头即将发布的财报及其未来几个月的前景将受到很大影响。【原文：With Netflix Inc. shares trading near their highest valuations going back to 2022, there’s a lot riding on the streaming giant’s upcoming earnings report and its outlook for the months ahead.】

item.title: 阿亚拉置地计划新建购物中心，挖掘菲律宾中产阶级崛起的潜力
item.description: 菲律宾收入最高的房地产公司阿亚拉置地公司（Ayala Land Inc.【原文：Ayala Land Inc., the Philippines’ top property firm by revenue, is banking on the nation’s growing middle class to fill shopping centers as it pursues an aggressive multiyear mall construction buildout.】

item.title: 苹果供应商比尔据说考虑重启香港 IPO
item.description: 据知情人士透露，全球最大的手机玻璃盖板生产商之一比尔水晶制造有限公司（Biel Crystal Manufactory Ltd.）正在考虑恢复其在香港首次公开募股的计划，因为在金融中心上市的热潮正在重新兴起。【原文：Biel Crystal Manufactory Ltd., one of the world’s largest producers of glass covers for phones, is considering reviving its plans for a Hong Kong initial public offering amid a resurgence of listings in the financial hub, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国 "加密周 "推动以太币基金的资金流入和交易量创下新高
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统支持的重要加密货币立法取得进展，美国以太币交易所交易基金的资金流入和交易量均创下历史新高。【原文：US exchange-traded funds for Ether posted record inflows and trading volumes as key crypto legislation endorsed by President Donald Trump advances.】

item.title: 费恩伯格将华尔街的推动力带入稀土矿产领域
item.description: 私募股权亿万富翁史蒂夫-范伯格（Steve Feinberg）在五角大楼任职仅四个月，就完成了他的第一笔大交易：4 亿美元押注美国唯一的稀土元素开采商，这是与中国竞争的关键商品。【原文：Just four months into his tenure at the Pentagon, private equity billionaire Steve Feinberg has landed his first big deal: a $400 million bet on the US’s only miner of rare-earth elements, a key commodity in the rivalry with China.】

item.title: 诺和诺德公司所有者与丹麦一起购买微软量子计算机
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）背后的基金会和丹麦政府将投资 8000 万欧元（9300 万美元）购买一台由微软驱动的量子计算机，以推动北欧地区的技术发展。【原文：The foundation behind Novo Nordisk A/S and the Danish government will invest €80 million ($93 million) in a Microsoft-powered quantum computer to boost technological development in the Nordic region.】

item.title: 台积电警告第三季度营收将受到更大汇率冲击
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s third-quarter performance is likely to face a bigger hit from a strong local currency following headwinds in the previous period, according to Chief Financial Officer Wendell Huang.】

item.title: 据说印度 WeWork 将开始营销 4.07 亿美元的 IPO
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，WeWork 印度管理有限公司已开始在南亚国家进行首次公开募股营销活动，以筹集多达 350 亿卢比（约合 4.07 亿美元）的资金。【原文：WeWork India Management Ltd. began marketing an initial public offering in the South Asian nation to raise as much as 35 billion rupees ($407 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 藏格矿业停产后中国锂价格和股价上涨
item.description: 在一家国内生产商称被地方当局勒令停止开采电池材料后，中国的锂价格和公司股价大幅飙升。【原文：Chinese lithium prices and company shares surged after a domestic producer said it was ordered by local authorities to halt mining of the battery material.】

item.title: 人工智能对法律行业的影响
item.description:
法律业务将迎来一场变革。【原文：

A shakeup is here for the business of law.

】

item.title: 人工智能对法律行业的影响
item.description: 人工智能对法律行业的影响【原文：What AI Is Doing to the Legal Industry】

item.title: 法国电力价格飙升，高温导致制冷需求增加
item.description: 由于反常的温暖天气推高了对空调的需求，法国的电价飙升。【原文：Electricity prices in France have surged as unseasonably warm weather pushes up demand for air conditioning — a trend that’s expected to continue.】

item.title: 贸易转向卢布，流入俄罗斯的货币减少
item.description: 随着贸易越来越多地转向卢布支付，流入俄罗斯的外币正在减少，这反映了西方限制俄罗斯跨境交易的努力所产生的影响。【原文：The flow of foreign currency into Russia is drying up as trade increasingly shifts to ruble payments, reflecting the impact of Western efforts to limit Russian cross-border transactions.】

item.title: 简街禁令后印度支持深化现金市场交易
item.description: 印度证券监管机构正在探索延长股票衍生产品期限的方法，以使散户投资者摆脱投机性短期合约。【原文：India’s securities regulator is exploring ways to extend the tenor of equity derivatives products to wean retail investors off speculative short-term contracts.】

item.title: Ocado 税前利润因 M&S 合资公司估值而大幅增长
item.description: Ocado Group Plc 公布了罕见的税前利润，这得益于其与 Marks & Spencer Group Plc 成立的杂货配送合资企业的估值。【原文：Ocado Group Plc posted a rare pretax profit helped by the valuation of its grocery delivery joint venture with Marks & Spencer Group Plc.】

item.title: 高盛牵头收购桑坦德银行约 4.6 亿欧元贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团同意从桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）购买约 4.6 亿欧元（5.34 亿美元）的西班牙抵押贷款。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. agreed to buy about €460 million ($534 million) in Spanish mortgages from Banco Santander SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Zara 女继承人桑德拉-奥尔特加的家族办公室利润增长 71
item.description: Inditex SA 财富继承人、西班牙最富有的女性桑德拉-奥尔特加的家族办公室去年的利润猛增了 71%，这主要得益于其在这家时装公司的股份。【原文：The family office of Sandra Ortega, an heir to the Inditex SA fortune and Spain’s wealthiest woman, posted a 71% profit jump last year, driven largely by its stake in the fashion firm.】

item.title: 华尔街银行损失数百万美元费用，七家公司与 i 公司交易失败
item.description: 在加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司放弃收购 Seven & i 控股公司之后，从高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Wall Street banks from Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to Morgan Stanley are missing out on millions of dollars in fees after Canada’s Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. abandoned its bid to buy Seven & i Holdings Co., in what could’ve been one of the world’s biggest deals this year.】
